newsitem.title: POLAND: INVESTORS BID FOR PLN 737 MLN POLISH FIXED BONDS.
newsitem.headline: INVESTORS BID FOR PLN 737 MLN POLISH FIXED BONDS.

text.p: Investors bid for 368 million zlotys of Polish two-year 16-percent bonds and for 369 million zlotys of five-year 12-percent bonds at the treasury's joint 700 million zloty tender, the National Bank of Poland said.
Results of the auction should be available later today.
